text: Glee's Heather Morris has been eliminated from Dancing with the Stars â€“ despite achieving the first perfect score of the season. She was kicked off during Week Six, and to make matters worse, she'd only just been reunited with her professional partner Maksim Chmerkovskiy for the first time since Week One, after he was forced to rest following a calf injury. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below They'd danced a rumba to TLC's'Waterfalls'as part of the Girl Band vs Boy Band theme of the week, wowing the judges. It earned the first perfect score of 40 for the current 24th season. Not too shabby.
